name: foundry-virtual-tabletop
description: Foundry Virtual Tabletop is a self-hosted virtual tabletop for playing tabletop RPGs online. It provides dynamic maps, character sheets, dice rollers, and third-party modules. Ideal for private online gaming sessions.
features: Virtual Tabletop: Self-hosted RPG platform, Dynamic maps, Character sheets and dice. Complete online gaming solution.
Module System: Third-party extensions. Customizable experience.
Private Sessions: Host your own games. No subscription fees.
Rich Features: Lighting, fog of war, audio. Immersive gameplay.
Game Systems: Support D&D, Pathfinder, and more. Universal platform.
Asset Library: Import maps and tokens. Rich content.
Automation: Macros and scripts. Enhanced gameplay.
Self-Hosted: Complete control. No cloud dependency.
